text: The Heavyweight class in the boxing competition was the highest weight class. Heavyweights were limited to those boxers weighing a minimum of 81 kilograms (178.6 lbs). 16 boxers qualified for this category. Like all Olympic boxing events, the competition was a straight single-elimination tournament. Both semifinal losers were awarded bronze medals, so no boxers competed again after their first loss. Bouts consisted of six rounds each. Five judges scored each bout. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font- size:110%;" width="35%" |- | |- | |- |rowspan="2" bgcolor="#cc9966"|Bronze|| |- | |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" ! title: Boxing at the 1968 Summer Olympics – Heavyweight
